mapper.insert: INSERT INTO signup_request (name, email, phone_num, username, password_hash, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNum}, #{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT req_id AS reqId, name AS name, email AS email, phone_num AS phoneNum, username AS username, password_hash AS passwordHash, status AS status, created_at AS createdAt, assigned_dept_id AS assignedDeptId, reviewed_by AS reviewedBy, reviewed_at AS reviewedAt, reject_reason AS rejectReason FROM signup_request WHERE req_id = #{reqId}

SELECT req_id AS reqId, name AS name, email AS email, phone_num AS phoneNum, username AS username, password_hash AS passwordHash, status AS status, created_at AS createdAt, assigned_dept_id AS assignedDeptId, reviewed_by AS reviewedBy, reviewed_at AS reviewedAt, reject_reason AS rejectReason FROM signup_request WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY req_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE signup_request SET status = 'APPROVED', assigned_dept_id = #{assignedDeptId}, reviewed_by = #{reviewedBy}, reviewed_at = NOW() WHERE req_id = #{reqId}
